name: RC4 WORLDCUP CT
description: The best for the best. Awesome capabilities straight from the Fischer race department for both powerful or tight turns. The RC4 offers world class precision and agility

name: RC4 WORLDCUP SC PRO
description: The RC4 The Curv is a top level ski for top skiers. It combines the performance of an all-out racing ski with the versatility of an all-arounder to guarantee the ultimate in turning enjoyment as well as straight-up fun from the first turn through to the last.

name: THE CURV
description: New shovel construction of the RC4 Worldcup SC offers greater stiffness for faster, more dynamic, razor sharp turns

name: RC4 POWER
description: Multi-discipline ski for big or tight turns for the most demanding skiers. The shovel shape and construction and excellent edge grip of the RC4 Power allow smooth, mid-size radius turns.
